alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 11:06AM EST until February 12 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. At J.T. Myers Dam, the river is forecast to crest in minor flood at 37.5 feet Friday morning, and not fall below flood stage until early Saturday morning. For the Ohio River...including J.T. Myers Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 36.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 37.5 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
